check.name: ResourceTitlePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Resource Title concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ResourceTitle is present."
if(ResourceTitle is not None and len(str(ResourceTitle)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ResourceTitle concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: ResourceTitle
selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/title//*) or (/metadata/simpleDc/title) or (/*/title) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/title//*) or (/*/ShortName | /*/LongName) or (/*/DataSetId) or (/DIF/Entry_Title) or (/DIF/Data_Set_Citation/Dataset_Title) or (/metadata/idinfo/citation/citeinfo/title) or (/eml/*/title) or (/resource/titles/title) or (/metadata/idinfo/citation/citeinfo/title) or (/metadata/idinfo/citation/citeinfo/title)
